name: Flexible Metal Hose DN250mm(10") X1440mm overall length,
description: From front flange end to Rear Flange end) - Flexible SS Metal Hose of SS321 Annular Corrugated Hose c/w SS304 double wire braiding for LPG with fitting 10" flanges of Class300 to both ends of Hose -End 1: welded fixed to 10”RF Flange- SS304 ANSI 300# ASTM-A105Gr.I/ANSI B16.5,& End 2: 10” RF flange-SS316 ANSI 300# RF ASTM-A105Gr.I/ANSI B16.5 c/w SS304 Lap joint in SCH40, Maximum Working Pressure: 25 bar(2.5MPa), Hydrotest pressure: 40 bar (4MPa), Minimum Burst Pressure- 120 bar(12MPa) and Working Temp. Range – Minus 20C To +60C . Note:- 1). Welded should be under ix ASME CODE, 2). Country of origin must be Indicated, 3). Test certificates must be provided 4). Pressure Range, Temp Range, Braiding Class, Life time & Manufacturing date should be indicated on Hose
